A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It is arguably the worst film in the Star Wars franchise. It marks the true intentions of Disney clear\, they prefer quantity over quality. I’ve watched it several times in hope that perhaps my judgement was swayed somehow during the first screening but alas\, it is complete rubbish. From the opening credits to the Jedi dust settling at the end\, the plot lacks a connection with the previous films and leaves little to work with for the third installment. I feel saddened that such amazing talent was wasted. Rain Johnson should be ashamed. I would be embarrassed to have my name even listed in the credits.
